title: Exploring Local History Through Android-Based Game Learning: A Case Study of Dampul Spring Site

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course where professionals experience innovative learning methods utilizing regional historical resources. Explores social value of local culture through convergent approaches with science

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more historical and cultural meanings of the Dampul Spring Relic using Android game-based learning tools.
Learners can design local history learning scenarios by integrating field visit materials with digital content.
Learners can creatively propose educational utilization plans for local historical resources through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
